en: This is heaven: her forehead pressed into me, her head under my arm, and my hand on her shoulder. We found each other by instinct. Even if I was half-asleep, I would never have done this knowingly. I wouldn’t know if she was okay with it. I don’t know it now either, but I am unable to move.
st: Sena ke leholimong: phatleng ea hae e hatelletsoe ka ho 'na, hlooho ea hae e tlas'a letsoho la ka, le letsoho la ka lehetleng la hae. Re ile ra hlokomelana ka hare ho tlhaho. Le hoja ke ne ke le halofo ea boroko, nka be ke sa ka ka etsa sena ka mokhoa o hlakileng. Ke ne ke sa tsebe hore na o ne a lokile ka eona. Ha ke tsebe le hona joale, empa ha ke khone ho tsamaea.
yo: Ọ̀run nìyí: iwájú rẹ̀ tẹ̀ mọ́ mi, orí rẹ̀ lábẹ́ apá mi, àti ọwọ́ mi lórí èjìká rẹ̀. A rí ara wa pẹ̀lú ìfura. Kódà bí mo bá ń sùn díẹ̀, mi ò bá ti mọ̀ọ́mọ̀ ṣe èyí láéláé. Mi ò mọ̀ bóyá ó tẹ́ ẹ lọ́rùn. Èmi náà kò mọ̀ ọ́ báyìí, ṣùgbọ́n mi ò lè rìn.
tn: 11Ke ena mahodimong: phatleng ya hae e ntlisitse, hlooho ya yona e ka tlasa letsoho la ka, le letsoho la ka lehetleng la yona. 'We found each other by instinct' - Re ne ra thusana mo maikutlong Le fa ke ne ke le mo sephatlong sa boroko, nka bo ke ise ke tsamaye ke dira jalo. Ke ne ke sa itse gore a o tsogile sentle. Ke ne ke sa itse gone jaanong mme ga ke kgone go tsamaya.
ty: Teie te ra'i : ua ô mai to'na rae i roto ia'u, to'na upoo i raro a'e i to'u rima, e to'u rima i ni'a i to'na tapono. Ua farerei maua i te tahi e te tahi na roto i te tahi mau mana'o. Noa'tu e, ua afa'ihia to'u taoto, eita roa'tu ïa vau e rave i te reira ma te ite-ore-hia. Aita vau i ite e, ua tano anei oia i ni'a i te reira. Aita atoa vau i ite i te reira i teie nei, tera râ, aita ta'u e nehenehe e ha'uti.
mai: ई स्वर्ग अछि: ओकर माथा हमरा मे दबा देल गेल, ओकर माथ हमर बांहि के नीचा आ हमर हाथ ओकरा कंधा पर। हम एक दोसरा के वृत्ति सं पाबि लेलहुं। भले हम आधा सुतल होइ, हम जानबूझ कए इ कहियो नहि करती। हम नहि जनैत छी जे ओ एहि सं ठीक छथि कि नहि। हम एखन सेहो नहि जनैत छी, मुदा हम हिलबा मे असमर्थ छी।

en: “Okay.” I have the urge to wait outside the door, even though I know she wants privacy. I turn and ignore the sounds on the other side of the door. When I was lusting after her a few minutes ago, what I should have been doing was worrying about her hangover.

mai: हम फिल्म पर ध्यान नहि दैत छी। हम सभ सोफे पर एकटा पंक्ति मे बैसल छी, तम्बू छोड़ि देल गेल अछि। ओ सभ फिल्म देख रहल छथि। हम बस अईठाम छी, ओकर लग। एहन लगैत अछि जेना टोस्ट ओहि उबकाईक चाल केलक जे ओ जागलाक बाद कयने छलीह।

en: “Sure.” I glance at Autumn before I get up. She’s nestled in a blanket, finishing the glass of water I got her and having another slice of toast. I take note again of how unfair it is that she can be so beautiful while hungover.

en: I cannot look back and say when I fell in love with Autumn Rose. Something I felt for her before I even learned to read had grown and sharpened as we grew up together. If I tried to pin it down, I would guess the first time I had thought of myself as “in love with Autumn” would have been before fifth grade. I don’t know if a psychologist would believe someone that young can be in love. All I know is what happened to me.
en_results: "title": "The Perks of Being a Wallflower", "author": "Stephen Chbosky"
st: Ha ke khone ho sheba morao mme ke re ha ke ratana le Autumn Rose. Ke ile ka ikutloa e le eena pele ke ithuta ho bala o ne a hōletse le ho latsoa ha re ntse re hōla hammoho. Haeba ke ile ka leka ho e pin fatše, ke ne ke nahana ka lekhetlo la pele ke ne ke nahana hore ke "ka lerato le Autumn" e ka be e bile pele ho sehlopha sa bohlano. Ha ke tsebe hore na setsebi sa kelello se ka lumela hore bacha ba ka ratana. Ke tseba feela se etsahetseng ho nna.
yo: Mi ò lè wo ẹ̀yìn kí n sì sọ nígbà tí mo yófẹ̀ẹ́ Autumn Rose. Nkan tí mo ní ìmọ̀lára fún un kí n tó kọ́ bí wọ́n ṣe ń kàwé ti dàgbà tí mo sì ń pọ̀ sí i bí a ṣe ń dàgbà papọ̀. Tí mo bá gbìyànjú láti fi sí ìsàlẹ̀, mà á lérò pé ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ tí mo máa ronú nípa ara mi gẹ́gẹ́ bíi "nínú ìfẹ́ pẹ̀lú Ìgbà Ìrọ̀lẹ̀" ìbá ti wà ṣáájú ìpele karùn-ún. Mi ò mọ̀ bóyá onímọ̀ nípa ọpọlọ yóò gbàgbọ́ pé ẹnìkan tí ó kéré lè nífẹ̀ẹ́. Gbogbo ohun tí mo mọ̀ ni ohun tó ṣẹlẹ̀ sí mi.
tn: Ke ne ke sa kgone go leba kwa morago e bile ke ne ke sa kgone go akanya ka lorato lwa me ka nako e ke neng ke ratana le ene. Ke ne ka simolola go ithuta go bala le go gola fa re ntse re gola mmogo. Fa ke ne ke akanya gore ke ne ke le mo nakong e e fetileng, ke ne ke akanya gore e ne e le lekgetlho la ntlha fa ke ne ke akanya gore ke ne ke le "mo loratong" e ka bo e le lekgetlho la ntlha. Ke ne ke sa itse gore a motho yo o lorato a ka mo rata. Ke ne ke itse gore ke eng se se nkgatlhitseng.
ty: Aita ta'u e nehenehe e hi'o i muri e ia parau i te taime a here ai au ia Autumn Rose. Te tahi mea ta'u i ite no'na hou a haapii ai au i te tai'o, ua tupu ïa i te rahi e te puai a paari ai maua. Mai te mea e, e tamata vau i te faaiti i te reira, e mana'o ïa vau e, te taime matamua a feruri ai au e, " ua here au ia Autumn ", na mua a'e ïa i te piha CM2. Aita vau i ite e, e ti'aturi anei te hoê tahu'a manava i te hoê taata apî ma te here. Ta'u noa i ite, o te ohipa ïa i tupu i ni'a ia'u.
mai: हम पाछू मुड़ि नहि देखि सकैत छी आ नहि कहि सकैत छी जे हमरा शरद गुलाबक प्रेममे कहिया पड़ल। जेना-जेना हम सभ एक सङ्ग पैघ भेलहुँ, पढ़नाइ सीखबासँ पहिने हम हुनका लेल किछु अनुभव कयलहुँ ओ बढ़ि गेल आ तेज भऽ गेल। जँ हम एकरा पिन करबाक प्रयास करब तऽ हमरा अनुमान लगैत जे पहिल बेर हम अपनाकेँ "शरद ऋतुसँ प्रेममे" सोचने छलहुँ जे पाँचम कक्षासँ पहिने होयत। हम नहि जनैत छी जे कोनो मनोवैज्ञानिक कोनो एहन व्यक्ति पर विश्वास करथि जे युवा प्रेममे पड़ि सकैत अछि। हम बस इ जनैत छी जे हमरा संग की भेल।
mg: Tsy afaka manao jery todika aho ary miteny rehefa raiki-pitia tamin'i Autumn Rose. Nitombo sy nihamafy ny zavatra tsapako taminy talohan'ny nianarako namaky teny rehefa nihalehibe izahay. Raha niezaka ny hametraka izany aho, dia mety ho efa talohan'ny kilasy fahadimy ny fotoana voalohany nieritreretako ny tenako ho toy ny "fitiavana amin'ny fararano". Tsy fantatro raha mino ny psikology fa misy olona iray izay afaka ny ho tia. Ny hany fantatro dia ny zava-nitranga tamiko.

en_shuffled_results: "title": "The Perks of Being a Wallflower", "author": "Stephen Chbosky"

en: I was in love with her, but we were only eleven, so being just friends felt natural, even if in my mind it was assuredly temporary. We always talked like we were living our whole lives together like The Mothers; surely she would realize we should get married. But I never got the sense she was preoccupied with me in the same way. She did not understand why The Mothers said we could not have sleepovers in the same bed anymore. And I did. She did not, when our hands happened to touch, try to make the moment linger. And I did.
en_results: "title": "The Perks of Being a Wallflower", "author": "Stephen Chbosky"
st: Ke ne ke ratana le eena, empa re ne re le leshome le motso o mong feela, kahoo ho ba metsoalle feela e neng e ikutloa e le ea tlhaho, leha ka kelellong ea ka e ne e le ea nakoana. Re ne re lula re bua joalokaha eka re ne re phela bophelo bohle ba rōna joaloka bo-'mè; O ne a tseba hore re lokela ho nyalana nakong e fetileng. Empa ha ho mohla nkileng ka ba le maikutlo a hore o ne a tšoenyehile ka 'na ka tsela e tšoanang. O ne a sa utloisise hore na ke hobane'ng ha 'Mè a re ha re sa khona ho robala betheng e le' ngoe. 'Me ke ile ka etsa. O ne a sa etse letho, ha matsoho a rona a ne a re ama, leka ho etsa hore nako e cheke. 'Me ke ile ka etsa.
yo: Mo nífẹ̀ẹ́ rẹ̀, ṣùgbọ́n ọmọ ọdún mọ́kànlá péré ni wá, nítorí náà jíjẹ́ ọ̀rẹ́ lásán ní ìmọ̀lára àdánidá, kódà bí ó bá jẹ́ pé nínú ọkàn mi ó jẹ́ ìdánilójú fún ìgbà díẹ̀. A máa ń sọ̀rọ̀ nígbà gbogbo bí ẹni pé à ń gbé ìgbé ayé wa papọ̀ bíi Àwọn Ìyá; Dájúdájú yóò mọ̀ pé ó yẹ kí a ṣe ìgbéyàwó. Ṣùgbọ́n mi ò mọ̀ pé ọkàn rẹ̀ balẹ̀ pẹ̀lú mi ní ọ̀nà kan náà. Kò yé e ìdí tí àwọn ìyá fi sọ pé a kò lè sùn lórí ibùsùn kan náà mọ́. Mo sì ṣe é. Kò, nígbà tí ọwọ́ wa kàn, gbìyànjú láti jẹ́ kí àkókò náà pẹ́. Mo sì ṣe é.

mai: हम हुनकासँ प्रेम करैत छलहुँ, मुदा हम सभ मात्र एगारह वर्षक छलहुँ, तेँ मात्र मित्र होयब स्वाभाविक बुझाइत छल, भले हमर मनमे ई निश्चित रूपसँ अस्थायी छल। हम सभ सदिखन गप्प करैत छलहुं जेना हम अपन पूरा जीवन द मदर्स जकाँ एक संग बिता रहल छी। निश्चित रूप सं हुनका एहसास होएत जे हमरा विवाह करबाक चाही। मुदा हमरा कहियो एहसास नहि भेल जे ओ हमरा संग ओहिना व्यस्त छलीह। ओ नहि बुझलनि जे द मदर्स किएक कहलखिन जे आब हमसभ एके बिछौनामे सुतबाक समय नहि लऽ सकैत छी। आ हम केलहुं। ओ नहि छलीह, जखन हमर हाथ छू लेलक, तखन एहि क्षणकेँ लम्बा करबाक प्रयास नहि कयलनि। आ हम केलहुं।

en: In elementary school, when she was particularly excited by a book, she would read it as we walked home, trusting me to make sure she didn’t run into anything. I remember being next to her and watching her cry as we walked, silent tears rolling down her cheeks, her gaze never wavering from the page. I also remember walking next to her as she laughed so hard that tears spilled out of the corners of her eyes.

st: Sekolong sa mathomo, ha a ne a thabile haholo ke buka, o ne a tla e bala ha re ntse re tsamaea hae, a ntšepa hore a se ke a matha ka letho. Ke hopola ho ba haufi le eena le ho shebella mohoo oa hae ha re ntse re tsamaea, meokho e khutsitseng e rothelang marameng a hae, ha ho mohla ho thekeseng leqephe. Ke boetse ke hopola ho tsamaea haufi le eena ha a ntse a tšeha ka thata hoo meokho e tšolotsoeng likhutlong tsa mahlo a hae.
yo: Ní ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ alákọ̀ọ́bẹ̀rẹ̀, nígbà tí inú rẹ̀ dùn gan-an pẹ̀lú ìwé kan, yóò kà á bí a ṣe ń rìn lọ sí ilé, tí ó gbẹ́kẹ̀lé mi láti rí i dájú pé kò sáré sínú ohunkóhun. Mo rántí pé mo wà lẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ rẹ̀ tí mo sì ń wo bí a ṣe ń sunkún bí a ṣe ń rìn, omijé ìdákẹ́jẹ́ẹ́ ń yí sí ẹ̀rẹ̀kẹ́ rẹ̀, ojú rẹ̀ kò yí padà láti ojú ìwé náà. Mo tún rántí bí mo ṣe ń rìn lẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ rẹ̀ bí ó ṣe ń rẹ́rìn-ín gidi débi pé omijé tú jáde láti igun ojú rẹ̀.
tn: Fa a ne a le kwa sekolong, o ne a itumeletse go bala baebele fa a ntse a le kwa gae, o ne a dumela gore ga a ise a nne le sepe. Ke gakologelwa gore o ne a le gaufi le ene le go bona selelo sa gagwe fa re ntse re tsamaya, dikeledi tse di didimetseng di ne di tshikinya marameng a gagwe, ga a ise a ke a tshikinyege go tswa mo tsebeng. Gape ke ne ke gopola go tsamaya le ene fa a ne a tshega thata mo e leng gore dikeledi di ne tsa tshologa mo dintlheng tsa matlho a gagwe.
ty: I roto i te fare haapiiraa tuatahi, ia anaanatae ana'e oia i te hoê buka, e tai'o oia i te reira a ho'i ai maua i te fare, ma te ti'aturi e, eita oia e horo i roto i te hoê mea. Te haamana'o ra vau i to ' u faaearaa i pihai iho ia ' na e to ' u hi'oraa ' tu ia ' na ia ta'i a haere noa ' i mâua, ma te ta'i mamû noa i nia i to ' na paparia, e aita roa ' tu to ' na mata i aueue noa ' ' e i nia i te api. Te haamana'o atoa ra vau i to ' u haereraa na pihai iho ia ' na a ata noa ' i oia ma te puai e ua tahe to ' na roimata na roto i te mau poro o to ' na mata.
mai: प्राथमिक विद्यालयमे, जखन ओ कोनो किताबसँ विशेष रूपसँ उत्साहित होइत छलीह, तखन हम सभ घर चलैत काल ओ एकरा पढ़ैत छलीह, हमरा पर विश्वास करैत छलीह जे ओ कोनो चीजमे नहि आबि जाय। हमरा मोन अछि जे हम चलैत काल हुनक बगलमे छलहुँ आ हुनका रोबैत देखैत छलहुँ, हुनक गालसँ मौन नोर बहैत छल, हुनक निगाह पृष्ठसँ कहियो नहि डगमगाइत छल। हमरा इहो मोन अछि जे ओ हुनक बगलमे चलैत छलीह जखन ओ एतेक जोरसँ हँसैत छलीह जे आँखिक कोनसँ नोर बहैत छल।
mg: Tany amin'ny sekoly fanabeazana fototra, rehefa tena nientanentana tamin'ny boky iray izy, dia namaky izany izy rehefa nandeha nody izahay, natoky ahy mba hahazoana antoka fa tsy nihazakazaka na inona na inona izy. Tsaroako fa teo akaikiny aho ary nijery azy nitomany teny am-pandehanana, ranomaso mangina nikoriana teo amin'ny takolany, tsy nihozongozona mihitsy ny fijeriny avy tao amin'ilay pejy. Tsaroako ihany koa ny nandehanako teo akaikiny rehefa nihomehy mafy izy ka nirotsaka ny ranomaso teny amin'ny zoron'ny masony.
dv: އެލިމެންޓަރީ ސްކޫލުގައި، ހާއްސަކޮށް ފޮތަކަށް ހިތްވަރު ލިބުމުން، އަހަންނަށް ގެއަށް ހިނގަމުން ދިޔައިރު، އޭނާ އެ ފޮތް ކިޔަނީ، އެއްވެސް ކަމަކާ ނުދުވާތޯ ބެލުމަށް އަހަރެންނަށް އިތުބާރުކޮށްގެންނެވެ. އަހަންނަށް ހަނދާންވަނީ ކައިރީގައި ތިއްބައި އަހަންނަށް ރޮވުނު މަންޒަރު، ހިމޭން ކަރުނަތައް ކޯތާފަތުން ފައިބަމުން ދިޔައިރު، އޭނާގެ ނަޒަރު ދުވަހަކުވެސް ސަފުހާއިން ފިލައިގެން ނުދާތީއެވެ. ލޮލުގެ ކަންފަތްދޮށުން ކަރުނަތައް ފައިބަމުން ދިޔައިރު އެހާ ބާރަށް ހޭލެވުނުއިރު ކައިރީގައި ހިނގާފައި ދިޔަ ހަނދާންވެސް އެބަހުއްޓެވެ.

en: Autumn has her flaws. She’s offhandedly arrogant about her looks. She lacks tenacity or drive for anything that isn’t reading or writing. When she’s in a bad mood, you must tread carefully. She can, in the blink of an eye, casually strike with a few cruel words that get right to the heart of your insecurities.
st: Hoetla ho na le liphoso tsa bona. O ikutloa a ikakasa ka ponahalo ea hae. O ne a sa khone ho ngola kapa ho ngola ntho leha e le efe e sa tsebeng ho bala kapa ho ngola. Ha o na le maikutlo a mabe, o tlameha ho tsamaea ka hloko. O ka khona, ka ho panya ha leihlo, ka mokhoa o makatsang ka mantsoe a seng makae a sehlōhō a fumanang hantle pelong ea ho se sireletsehe ha hao.
yo: Ìgbà ìrọ̀lẹ̀ ní àwọn àléébù rẹ̀. Ó ní ìgbéraga nípa ìrísí rẹ̀. Kò ní ìgboyà tàbí wakọ̀ fún ohunkóhun tí kò kà tàbí kíkọ. Nígbà tí ó bá wà nínú ìmọ̀lára tí kò dára, o gbọ́dọ̀ tẹ̀ ẹ́ dáadáa. Ó lè, ní ìṣẹ́jú ojú kan, kọlù pẹ̀lú àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ ìkà díẹ̀ tí ó tọ́ sí ọkàn àìdáàbòbò rẹ.
tn: Mariga a ne a na le makoa a gagwe. 'O ne a ikgogomosa ka se a se bonang' - She was arrogant about her looks O ne a se na bokgoni jwa go kgweetsa sengwe le sengwe se a se balang kgotsa se se sa se balang. Fa o na le maikutlo a a sa siamang, o tshwanetse go gata ka kelotlhoko. O kgona go bua mafoko a le mmalwa a a setlhogo a a ka go thusang gore o se ka wa utlwa botlhoko.
ty: Te vai ra to Autumn to ' na mau paruparu. Mea teoteo roa o ' na no to ' na hoho'a mata. Aita to'na e aravihi e aore râ, aita e hinaaro i te hoê mea aita e tai'o e aore râ, e papa'i. Mai te peu e e huru ino to ' na, e tia ia outou ia taataahi maitai. E nehenehe ta ' na, i roto i te hoê amoraa mata, e tairi ma te ore e faahiti i te tahi mau parau ino o te haaputapû roa i te mafatu o to outou tiaturi ore.
mai: शरद ऋतु मे ओकर दोष अछि। ओ अपन रूप के लेके अपमानजनक रूप सं अभिमानी छथि। हुनका कोनो एहन चीजक लेल तप या प्रेरणाक कमी छनि जे पढ़ि वा लिखि नहि रहल हो। जखन ओ खराब मूड मे रहैत छथि तखन अहां के सावधानी सं चलबाक चाही। ओ आँखिक झपकीमे आकस्मिक रूपसँ किछु क्रूर शब्दसँ प्रहार कऽ सकैत छथि जे अहाँक असुरक्षाक हृदय धरि पहुँचि जाइत अछि।
mg: Ny fararano dia manana ny kilemany. Mirehareha amin'ny endriny izy. Tsy ampy faharetana izy na mitondra fiara ho an'ny zavatra tsy mamaky teny na manoratra. Rehefa ao anatin'ny toe-tsaina ratsy izy dia tsy maintsy mitandrina tsara ianao. Afaka mamely amin'ny alalan'ny teny mahery vaika vitsivitsy izay tonga ao am-pon'ny tsy fandriampahalemana izy, ao anatin'ny indray mipi-maso.
dv: އޯޓަމްގެ ކިބައިގައި އޭނާގެ އުނިކަމެއް އެބަހުއްޓެވެ. އޭނަގެ ސިފަތަކާމެދު އޭނާ ހުރީ ވަރަށް ބޮޑާވެފައެވެ. ކިޔެވުމުގައި ނުވަތަ ނުލިޔުނު އެއްވެސް ކަމަކަށް އެކަމަނާގެ ކިބައިގައި ހަރުދަނާކަމެއް ނުވަތަ ދުއްވުމެއް ނެތެވެ. އޭނާގެ މޫޑު ގޯސްވެއްޖެނަމަ ފަރުވާތެރިކަމާއެކު ހިނގަން ޖެހޭނެއެވެ. ލޮލުގެ ފިނިމޫސުމުގައި، ތިބާގެ ނާމާންކަމުގެ ހިތަށް އެރި ފަދަ އަނިޔާވެރި ބަސްތަކަކުން އެކަމަނާއަށް ކުއްލިގޮތަކަށް ޙަމަލާދެވިދާނެއެވެ.

en: I head downstairs to the kitchen and eat the leftover pizza. I recycle the box and pour a Coke. There’s an inch of rum left. I look at it and then put it back on the counter. It won’t help me. Maybe Autumn will want it before The Mothers come home tomorrow.

st: Ke theohela tlase ka kichineng ebe ke ja pizza e setseng. Ke tla nchafatsa lebokose la ka ebe ke reka kuku. Ho na le lisenthimithara tse setseng tsa rum. Ke e shebile ebe ke e beha hape holim'a countertop. E ke ke ea nthusa. Mohlomong lehlabula le tla e batla pele bo-mme ba fihla hae hosane.

mai: हम निच्चाँ भनसाघर जाइत छी आ बचल पिज्जा खाइत छी। हम बक्सा के रीसायकल करैत छी आ एकटा कोक ढारि दैत छी। एक इंच रम बचल अछि। हम एकरा देखैत छी आ फेर काउंटर पर राखि दैत छी। इ हमरा मदद नहि करत। भऽ सकैत अछि जे शरद ऋतुकेँ काल्हि मातासभ घर अयबासँ पहिने ई चाही।

en: I feel her shoulders slump, followed by the faintest of whimpers. She’s done crying. I could move, but I don’t. I hold her gently, careful to make sure she’s in control, and she can pull away with the slightest of movements.

en: I understand this much: Autumn lives in this world and the fictions of her mind or those written by others like her. Whatever it is that puts us together as people, be it God, genes, or destiny, Autumn was made to tell stories. She’s going to be an amazing writer. She’s always been amazing. Whatever this novel is about, it’s going to blow my mind. I know it.

st: Ke utloisisa sena haholo: Hoetla ho phela lefatšeng lena le likhopolo-taba tsa kelello ea hae kapa tse ngotsoeng ke ba bang ba tšoanang le eena. Ho sa tsotellehe hore na ke hobane'ng ha re le batho re le batho, e be Molimo, liphatsa tsa lefutso kapa pheletso, Hoetla ho ne ho etsoa hore re phete lipale. E tla ba sengoli se makatsang. Kamehla o ne a makatsa. Ho sa tsotellehe hore na buka ena e bua ka eng, e tla phephetsa kelello ea ka. Ke a e tseba.
yo: Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ èyí yé mi: Ìgbà ìrọ̀lẹ̀ ń gbé nínú ayé yìí àti ìtàn àròsọ ọkàn rẹ̀ tàbí àwọn tí àwọn ẹlòmíràn bíi rẹ̀ kọ. Ohunkóhun tí ó bá jẹ́ tí ó bá kó wa papọ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí ènìyàn, jẹ́ Ọlọ́run, jíìnì, tàbí àyànmọ́, ìgbà ìrọ̀lẹ̀ ni wọ́n ṣe láti sọ ìtàn. Ó máa jẹ́ òkọ̀wé àgbàyanu. Ó máa ń yani lẹ́nu ní gbogbo ìgbà. Ohunkóhun tí ìwé ìtàn yìí bá jẹ́, yóò wú mi lórí. Mo mọ̀ bẹ̀.
tn: Ke tlhaloganya seno thata: Autumn o tshela mo lefatsheng leno le ditlhamane tsa mogopolo wa gagwe kgotsa tse di kwadilweng ke batho ba bangwe ba ba tshwanang le ene. Le fa go ntse jalo, fa re le batho, re le batho, e nne Modimo, dijini kgotsa dilo tse di molemo, go ne ga dirwa gore re bue ka dilo tse di molemo. He's gonna be a strange author. O ne a gakgamatsa ka metlha. Le fa e le eng se se neng se bua ka kgang eno, se tla dira gore ke se ka ka nna le mogopolo wa me. Ke a e itse.
ty: Ua taa maitai ia'u te reira : Te ora nei o Autumn i roto i teie ao e te mau mea feruri-noa-hia o to'na feruriraa e aore râ, te mau mea i papa'ihia e te tahi atu mau taata mai ia'na te huru. Noa'tu eaha te mea e tahoê nei ia tatou ei nunaa, ei Atua anei, ei atua anei, e aore râ, ei hopearaa, ua ravehia ïa te reira no te faati'a i te mau aamu. E riro oia ei taata papa'i faahiahia mau. E mea maere mau oia. Noa ' tu eaha te huru o teie buka aamu, e puta mai te reira i roto i to ' u feruriraa. Ua ite au i te reira.
mai: हम एतेक बुझैत छी : शरद ऋतु एहि दुनियामे रहैत अछि आ ओकर मनक कथा वा हुनका सन आन लोकनि द्वारा लिखल गेल कथा। ई जे किछु अछि जे हमरासभकेँ लोकक रूपमे एक सङ्ग रखैत अछि, चाहे ओ ईश्वर हो, जीन हो, वा प्रारब्ध, शरद ऋतुकेँ कथा सुनयबाक लेल बनाओल गेल छल। ओ एकटा अद्भुत लेखक होबए जा रहल छथि। ओ हरदम अद्भुत रहलीह। ई उपन्यास जे किछु अछि, ओ हमरा दिमाग के उड़ा देत। हम ई बूझैत छी.
mg: Azoko tsara izao zavatra izao: Miaina eto amin'ity izao tontolo izao ity ny fararano ary ny tantara foronina ao an-tsainy na ireo nosoratan'ny hafa tahaka azy. Na inona na inona mampitambatra antsika amin'ny maha-olona, na Andriamanitra izany, na fototarazo, na lahatra, dia natao hitantara tantara ny Autumn. Ho lasa mpanoratra mahatalanjona izy. Mahagaga foana izy. Na inona na inona momba ity tantara ity, dia ho tonga ao an-tsaiko izany. Fantatro izany.
dv: އަޅުގަނޑަށް ވަރަށް ބޮޑަށް ވިސްނޭ: އޮޓަމް ދިރިއުޅެނީ މިދުނިޔޭގައި، އޭނާގެ ސިކުނޑީގެ ފިކްޝަންތައް ނުވަތަ އޭނާ ފަދަ އެހެން މީހުން ލިޔެފައިވާ ފިކްޝަންތަކުގަ އެވެ. الله ތަޢާލާ ކަމުގައިވިޔަސް، ޖީންސް ކަމުގައިވިޔަސް، ނުވަތަ ނަސީބު ކަމުގައިވިޔަސް، މީސްތަކުންގެ ގޮތުގައި އަޅުގަނޑުމެން އެކަތިގަނޑަކަށް ކޮށްދޭ ކޮންމެ ކަމެއް ވިޔަސް، އޮޓަމް އަކީ ވާހަކަތައް ކިޔައިދޭން ހަދާފައިވާ އެއްޗެކެވެ. އޭނާ ވާނީ ވަރަށް މޮޅު ލިޔުންތެރިއަކަށެވެ. އޭނާ އަކީ އަބަދު ވެސް ވަރަށް ހިތްގައިމު މީހެކެވެ. މި ނޮވެލް ކޮންމެ ގޮތަކަށް ވިޔަސް އަހަރެންގެ ސިކުނޑި ފުނޑުފުނޑުކޮށްލާނެ އެވެ. އަހަންނަށް އެނގޭ ތިކަން.

en: “Not all dragons want to wipe out faeries, only some of them, and the other dragons are finally joining the faeries’ fight,” Autumn explained to me as if these were current events.

st: "Ha se dragons tsohle tse batlang ho hlakola li-faeries, ke tse ling feela tsa tsona, 'me dragons tse ling li qetella li kenella ntoeng ea faeries," Hoetla o ile a ntlhalosetsa joalo ka ha eka tsena e ne e le liketsahalo tsa hona joale.
yo: "Kì í ṣe gbogbo àwọn dírágónì ló fẹ́ pa àwọn faeries rẹ́, díẹ̀ nínú wọn nìkan, àti pé àwọn dírágónì yòókù ti ń darapọ̀ mọ́ ìjà faeries," Autumn ṣàlàyé fún mi bí ẹni pé àwọn wọ̀nyí jẹ́ àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́.
tn: "Ga se di-dragons tsotlhe tse di batlang go phimola di-faeries, ke dingwe fela tsa tsone, mme kwa bofelong go nna le di-dragons tse dingwe di tsenela ntwa ya faeries," Go ne ga tlhalosa jalo ka mariga.
ty: " Aita te mau teni atoa e hinaaro e tumâ i te mau faeries, te tahi noa râ o ratou, e te tahi atu mau teni, tei roto ïa i te aroraa a te mau faeries ", o ta Autumn ïa i faataa mai ia'u mai te huru ra e, e mau ohipa teie e tupu nei.

en: When Autumn is depressed or stressed or writing, she gets so inside her head that she forgets about her body. I can’t imagine not noticing that I’m hungry. I can’t imagine living so outside the physical world the way she does.

en: Christmas might be too soon. She can’t keep track of her phone or her keys. How is she going to keep track of her drinks at parties? I’m going to have to stick around to make sure whatever guy she falls for treats her right. This time, if I see something, I’ll say something.
st: Keresemese e ka ba haufinyane haholo. Ha a khone ho boloka mohala oa hae kapa linotlolo tsa hae. O tla etsa joang hore a shebe lino tsa hae tse sa tsoang libakeng tse ling? Ke tla tlameha ho lula ke le haufi le ho etsa bonnete ba hore na ke mang eo a ratanang le eena bakeng sa ho mo tšoara hantle. Lekhetlong lena, haeba ke bona ho hong, ke tla bua ntho e itseng.
yo: Kérésìmesì lè ti yá jù. Kò lè tọpa ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ tàbí àwọn kọ́kọ́rọ́ rẹ̀. Báwo ni yóò ṣe máa tọpinpin ohun mímu rẹ̀ níbi ayẹyẹ? Mà á ní láti dúró káàkiri láti rí i dájú pé ọkùnrin yòówù tí ó bá ṣubú fún ìtọ́jú rẹ̀ tọ́. Ní àkókò yìí, tí mo bá rí nǹkan, mà á sọ nǹkan kan.
tn: Christmas Gone Too Soon? Ga a kgone go boloka mogala wa gagwe kgotsa dilotlolo tsa gagwe. O ne a ikutlwa jang fa a ne a nwa bojalwa jo bo tshwanang le jwa gagwe? Ke tla tshwanelwa ke go dira gore go nne le sengwe le sengwe se a ka se dirang gore a se ka a mo thusa. Mo nakong e e tlang, fa ke bona sengwe se ke tla se buang.
ty: Eita e maoro roa e tae mai te Noela. Eita ta'na e nehenehe e hi'opo'a i ta'na niuniu e aore râ, i ta'na mau taviri. Nafea oia e ite ai i ta ' na mau inu i te mau arearearaa? E tia ia ' u ia faaea noa i pihai iho ia ' na no te haapapu e e rave anei te taata o ta ' na e topa i nia i to ' na tiaraa. I teie taime, mai te mea e, e ite au i te hoê mea, e parau ïa vau i te hoê mea.

en: Abruptly, Autumn sits up. She hugs the covers around herself like bandages on a wound. I don’t understand what’s happened. I confessed to punching blameless walls and rejoicing in her heartbreak, and she smiled sweetly at me. Why is she upset now? I sit up too.
st: Ka tšohanyetso, lehlabula le lula le le teng. O pota-potile joalo ka li-bandage maqebeng a leqeba. Ha ke utloisise se etsahalang. Ke ile ka ipolella ho otla mabota a se nang molato le ho thaba ka pelo ea hae ea pelo, 'me o ile a bososela ka monate ho' na. Ke hobane'ng ha a halefile hona joale? Le 'na ke lula fatše.
yo: Lójijì, ìgbà ìrọ̀lẹ̀ jókòó sókè. Ó dì mọ́ àwọn ìdérí tó yí ara rẹ̀ ká gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìbàjẹ́ lórí ọgbẹ́. Ohun tí ó ṣẹlẹ̀ kò yé mi. Mo jẹ́wọ́ pé mo lu àwọn ògiri tí kò ní ẹ̀bi àti ìdùnnú nínú ìbànújẹ́ ọkàn rẹ̀, ó sì rẹ́rìn-ín pẹ̀lú ìdùnnú sí mi. Kí ló dé tí inú ń bí i báyìí? Èmi náà jókòó.

en: “Don’t worry,” she whispers. “I know what to do.” Autumn pushes me down on the bed, and for some unknown period of time, I am entirely at her mercy.

en: He rings up Autumn’s candy before grabbing the condoms from the shelf behind him. He glances at me with a smirk, trying to catch my eye. I need to tell Autumn the truth about this guy.
st: O fana ka li-candy tsa Autumn pele a tšoara likhohlopo shelefong ka mor'a hae. O ile a sheba 'na ka smirk, a leka ho ts'oara leihlo la ka. Ke hloka ho bolella 'nete ka moshemane enoa.
yo: Ó dún ṣándíìtì ìgbà ìrọ̀lẹ̀ kí ó tó mú àwọn kóńdòmù náà láti orí pẹpẹ lẹ́yìn rẹ̀. Ó wò mí pẹ̀lú ẹ̀rín, ó ń gbìyànjú láti mú ojú mi. Mo ní láti sọ òtítọ́ ìgbà ìrọ̀lẹ̀ nípa ọmọkùnrin yìí.
tn: 'O ne a rêka dinôtsidi tsa mariga' - He got to get the condoms from the shelf behind him O ne a ntjheba ka lesire, a leka ho ntjheba. 'Ke batla go bua nnete ka monna yono' - I need to tell the truth about this guy

en: It takes so long to convince her that nothing physical happened with Autumn until last night that I drive us over the river and into the rural plains outside East St. Louis. The rain comes down harder, and lightning strikes flash across the sky, stealing our words from us. It feels jarringly intimate.
st: Ho nka nako e telele haholo ho mo kholisa hore ha ho letho le etsahetseng ka Hoetla ho fihlela bosiung bo fetileng hoo ke re khannoang ka noka le lithoteng tsa mahaeng kantle ho East St. Louis. Pula e theoha ka matla, 'me lehalima le hlaba ka mose leholimong, ho utsoa mantsoe a rona ho rona. E ikutloa e le haufi-ufi.

en: My parents have come with me, and they’re waiting by the car. I’m their seventh son, their last. My parents don’t like each other much, but we’re Catholic. Or they’re Catholic. Point is, as far as my parents go, they love me, but they’ve done it all before and don’t have the energy to have much of a relationship with me. Plus, if they leave their carefully constructed confines to spend time with me, they may encounter each other, which they’ve both ruled is not worth it.

st: Batsoali ba ka ba ile ba tla le nna mme ba nkemetse ka koloing. Ke mora oa hae oa bosupa, 'me ke mora oa hae oa ho qetela. Batsoali ba ka ha ba ratene haholo, empa re Mak'hatholike. Kapa e K'hatholike. Taba ke hore, ha batsoali ba ka ba tsamaea, baa nthata, empa ba entse tsohle pele mme ha ba na matla a ho ba le kamano e ngata le nna. Ho feta moo, haeba ba tlohela libaka tsa bona tse hahiloeng ka hloko hore ba qete nako le 'na, ba ka kopana le e mong, eo ka bobeli ba busitseng ha e na thuso.
yo: Àwọn òbí mi ti tẹ̀lé mi, wọ́n sì ń dúró lẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́. Èmi ni ọmọkùnrin keje wọn, ìkẹyìn wọn. Àwọn òbí mi kò fẹ́ràn ara wọn púpọ̀, ṣùgbọ́n Kátólíìkì ni wá. Tabi wọn jẹ Catholic. Kókó ọ̀rọ̀ ni pé, níwọ̀n ìgbà tí àwọn òbí mi bá lọ, wọ́n nífẹ̀ẹ́ mi, ṣùgbọ́n wọ́n ti ṣe gbogbo rẹ̀ tẹ́lẹ̀ wọn kò sì ní agbára láti ní ìbáṣepọ̀ púpọ̀ pẹ̀lú mi. Pẹ̀lúpẹ̀lú, tí wọ́n bá fi àwọn ààyè tí wọ́n kọ́ dáadáa sílẹ̀ láti lo àkókò pẹ̀lú mi, wọ́n lè pàdé ara wọn, èyí tí àwọn méjèèjì ti dájọ́ kò tó bẹ́ẹ̀.
tn: Batsadi ba me ba ne ba tla kwa go nna mme ba letile ka koloi. Ke ngwana wa bone wa bosupa, le wa bone wa bofelo. Batsadi ba me ga ba ratene, mme gone ke Mokatoliki. Kana ke Bakatoliki ba ba ineetseng. Le fa go ntse jalo, fa batsadi ba me ba ne ba nthata, mme ba ne ba sa kgone go dira dilo tse dintsi tse ba neng ba di dira le nna. Le fa go ntse jalo, fa ba ka tswa ba ne ba dira dilo tse di molemo, ba ka nna ba kopana le bone ka bobedi jwa bone, ga go na mosola ope.
ty: Ua haere mai to'u na metua na muri iho ia'u, e te tia'i ra raua i piha'i iho i te pereoo. O vau te hitu o ta raua tamaiti, ta raua tamaiti hopea. Aita to ' u mau metua e au roa ra i te tahi e te tahi, e Katolika râ mâua. Aore ra e katolika ratou. Te parau tano maori râ, ia haere to'u na metua, ua here raua ia'u, tera râ, ua rave raua i te mau mea atoa na mua a'e nei, e aita to raua e puai no te faatupu i te hoê auraa rahi e o vau. Hau atu â, mai te mea e, e vaiiho ratou i ta ratou mau tauhaa no te parahi i piha'i iho ia'u, e farerei paha ratou i te tahi e te tahi, e aita ho'i e faufaa to te reira.
mai: हमर माता-पिता हमरा संग आयल छथि, आ ओ सभ गाड़ी लग प्रतीक्षा कए रहल छथि। हम हुनकर सातम बेटा छी, हुनकर अंतिम बेटा। हमर माता-पिता एक दोसरकेँ बेसी पसिन्न नहि करैत छथि, मुदा हम कैथोलिक छी। या ओ कैथोलिक छथि। मुद्दा ई अछि जे जतय धरि हमर माता-पिताक बात अछि, ओ हमरा सँ प्रेम करैत छथि, मुदा ओ सभ पहिने कऽ चुकल छथि आ हमरा सङ्ग बेसी सम्बन्ध रखबाक ऊर्जा नहि रखैत छथि। संगहि, जँ ओ लोकनि हमरा सङ्ग समय बितयबाक लेल अपन सावधानीपूर्वक निर्मित सीमा छोड़ि दैत छथि तँ ओ एक दोसराक सामना कऽ सकैत छथि, जकरा ओ दुनू फैसला देलनि अछि जे एकर लायक नहि अछि।
mg: Niaraka tamiko ny ray aman-dreniko, ary miandry eo akaikin'ny fiara izy ireo. Izaho no zanany fahafito, ny farany. Tsy dia mifankatia loatra ny ray aman-dreniko, saingy Katolika izahay. Katolika izy ireo. Ny zava-misy dia, raha ny fandehan'ny ray aman-dreniko, tia ahy izy ireo, saingy efa nanao izany rehetra izany izy ireo taloha ary tsy manana hery hananana fifandraisana betsaka amiko. Fanampin'izany, raha toa izy ireo ka mamela ny fe-potoam-piasany tsara mba hiara-handany fotoana amiko, dia mety hifanena izy ireo, izay samy nitondra azy roa ireo dia tsy mendrika izany.
dv: މައިންބަފައިން ވެސް އަހަންނާއެކު އައިސް ކާރުގެ އިންތިޒާރުގައި ތިއްބެވެ. އަހަންނަކީ އެމީހުންގެ ހަތްވަނަ ދަރިފުޅު، އެމީހުންގެ އެންމެ ފަހު ދަރިފުޅެވެ. މައިންބަފައިން އެކަކު އަނެކަކު ދެކެ މާ ބޮޑަށް ލޯބި ނުވި ނަމަވެސް އަހަރެމެންނަކީ ކެތަލިކް ބައެކެވެ. ނުވަތަ އެމީހުންނަކީ ކެތަލިކް ބައެކެވެ. ވާހަކައަކީ މައިންބަފައިންނަށް ބަލާއިރު އެމީހުން އަހަރެންދެކެ ލޯބިވާ ކަމަށާއި ނަމަވެސް އެ ހުރިހާ ކަމެއް މީގެ ކުރިން ވެސް ކޮށްފައިވާ ކަމަށާއި އަހަރެންނާ މާ ބޮޑު ގުޅުމެއް ބޭއްވޭނެ ހަކަތައެއް ނެތް ކަމަށެވެ. ހަމައެހެންމެ، އަޅުގަނޑާ އެކީގައި ވަގުތު ހޭދަކުރުމަށް ޓަކައި، އެމީހުން ވަރަށް ފަރުވާތެރިކަމާއެކު ހަދާފައި ހުރި ބަންދުތައް ދޫކޮށްލައިފިނަމަ، އެކަކު އަނެކަކާ ކުރިމަތިލާން ޖެހިދާނެ، ދެމީހުން ވެސް ވެރިކަން ކުރި ގޮތަކީ އޭގެ އަގެއް ނޫން.

en: I let that question be my only thought, over and over again, until the words become meaningless. I keep running until there is no more anger, no more thinking, only my breathing, only telling myself to keep pushing. I keep running, and I keep running, and I just go.

en: “Hi,” I say. “Nice to meet you. I was going to grab my stuff and take a shower.” It’s early evening, but it’s still hot as blazes out, and everyone was traveling and moving today, so my excuse to be antisocial is accepted.

en: I’m almost finished with the front yard, so I wrap up the last bit, then make my way over. I drink until the ice clinks empty at the bottom. I knock on the doorframe and call her name softly. When there’s no answer, I ring the bell.

mai: हम आगू के आँगन के संग लगभग पूरा कऽ लेलहुं, तेँ हम अंतिम बिट लपेटैत छी, फेर अपन रास्ता बना लैत छी। हम तखन धरि पीबैत छी जा धरि बर्फ निचला भाग मे खाली नहि भए जाए। हम दरवाजाक चौखट पर दस्तक दैत छी आ धीरे-धीरे ओकर नाम पुकारैत छी। जखन कोनो जवाब नहि भेटैत अछि तखन हम घंटी बजबैत छी।

en: Autumn shakes her head. “You’re the first person I told. I found out a week ago. I’m still trying to wrap my head around it.” She’s finally dipping the stick in her candy powder and stirring it slowly.
st: Hoetla hoetla ho sisinya hlooho ea hae. "Ke uena motho oa pele eo ke mmoleletseng. Ke e fumane beke e fetileng. Ke ntse ke leka ho beha hlooho ea ka holim 'a eona. " Qetellong o kenya sekhomaretsi ka phofo ea hae ea candy mme a e hlohlelletsa butle.

en: “You are looking very healthy,” he says. “When I saw you in the hospital, it was—” He throws up his hands. Apparently there aren’t words. “But now? You have some color. You have some weight on you. How are you feeling?”

en: I’ve spoken to my father on the phone twice since getting out of the hospital. The last phone call, he told me that he’d been assigned a business trip in Japan that would last six months but maybe more, depending on the markets.
en_results: "title": "The Brief Wondrous Life of Oscar Wao", "author": "Junot Díaz"
st: Ke ile ka bua le ntate oa ka makhetlo a mabeli ho tloha ha ke tsoa sepetlele. Mohala oa ho qetela, o ile a mpolella hore o ne a fuoe leeto la khoebo Japane le neng le tla nka likhoeli tse tšeletseng empa mohlomong ho feta, ho latela mebaraka.
yo: Mo ti bá bàbá mi sọ̀rọ̀ lórí ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ lẹ́ẹ̀mejì láti ìgbà tí mo ti jáde kúrò ní ilé ìwòsàn. Ìpè ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ tó kẹ́yìn, ó sọ fún mi pé wọ́n ti yàn án gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìrìn-àjò okòwò ní Japan tí yóò pẹ́ fún oṣù mẹ́fà ṣùgbọ́n bóyá jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ, gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọjà.
tn: Ke ne ka bua le rre wa me gabedi fa a sena go tswa kwa bookelong. O ne a re o ne a tsaya loeto lwa kgwebo kwa Japane, mme gongwe go feta dikgwedi di le thataro, go ikaegile ka mebaraka.
ty: Ua paraparau vau i to'u metua tane na roto i te niuniu e piti taime mai te taime a matara mai ai au i te fare ma'i. Te niuniu hopea, ua parau mai oia ia'u e, ua faataahia oia no te hoê tere ohipa i te fenua Tapone e ono ava'e te maoro, tera râ, penei a'e hau atu, tei te huru ïa o te matete.
mai: अस्पतालसँ बाहर निकललाक बाद हम अपन पितासँ दू बेर फोन पर गप्प कऽ चुकल छी। अंतिम फोन कॉल, ओ हमरा कहलनि जे हुनका जापानमे एकटा व्यापारिक यात्रा सौंपल गेल छल जे छह मास धरि चलत, मुदा बाजारक आधार पर शायद बेसी होयत।
mg: Niresaka indroa tamin'ny raiko tamin'ny finday aho hatramin'ny nivoahany tao amin'ny hopitaly. Tamin'ny antso an-tariby farany, nilaza tamiko izy fa nomena dia ara-barotra tany Japana izay haharitra enim-bolana, saingy angamba mihoatra noho izany, miankina amin'ny tsena.

en: I’ve been doing my research. I conquered my fear of judgmental looks from the staff that had watched me grow up checking out stacks of books each visit and made my way to the library. In addition to a book on French parenting and another on baby development, my bravery was rewarded by excitement from the librarians and flyers about story time and pre-K reading clubs.
st: Ke 'nile ka etsa lipatlisiso tsa ka. Ke ile ka hlōla tšabo ea ka ea ho shebella ho tloha basebetsi ba neng ba shebelletse 'na hōla hlahloba stacks ea libuka ketelo e' ngoe le e 'ngoe' me a etsa tsela ea ka laebraring. Ntle le buka ea botsoali ba Mafora le e 'ngoe ka nts'etsopele ea masea, sebete sa ka se ile sa putsoa ke thabo e tsoang ho li-librarians le li-flyers mabapi le nako ea lipale le lihlopha tsa ho bala pele ho K.
yo: Mo ti ń ṣe ìwádìí mi. Mo ṣẹ́gun ìbẹ̀rù ìrísí ìdájọ́ mi láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ tí wọ́n ti wò mí bí mo ṣe ń dàgbà láti ṣàyẹ̀wò ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìwé ìbẹ̀wò kọ̀ọ̀kan mo sì lọ sí yàrá ìkàwé. Ní àfikún sí ìwé kan lórí ìtọ́jú òbí ilẹ̀ Faransé àti òmíràn lórí ìdàgbàsókè ọmọdé, ìgboyà mi jẹ èrè pẹ̀lú ìdùnnú láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn oníṣẹ́ ìkàwé àti àwọn ìwé pélébé nípa àkókò ìtàn àti àwọn ẹgbẹ́ ìkàwé ṣíwájú K.

mai: हम अपन शोध कए रहल छी। हम ओहि कर्मचारीसँ निर्णयात्मक रूपक भय पर विजय प्राप्त कयलहुँ जे हमरा प्रत्येक यात्रामे किताबक ढेर देखैत पैघ होइत देखैत छलाह आ पुस्तकालय दिस जाइत छलाह। फ्रांसीसी पालन-पोषण पर एकटा किताब आ बच्चाक विकास पर एकटा किताबक अतिरिक्त, हमर बहादुरीकेँ लाइब्रेरियन आ फ्लायरक स्टोरीटाइम आ प्री-के रीडिंग क्लबक विषयमे उत्साहसँ पुरस्कृत कयल गेल।
mg: Efa nanao ny fikarohana nataoko aho. en: Mom, the expert shopper in all situations, leads the way to the furniture corner where the little crib sits. “It doesn’t quite match the rest of the wood in your room,” she muses. “It would almost be better if it was totally different. This will look like we tried to match it and failed. I’m certain I could find one online in a better color.”
st: 'Mè, moreki oa litsebi maemong ohle, o lebisa sekhutlong sa thepa ea ka tlung moo crib e nyane e lutseng teng. "Ha e lumellane le sefate se setseng ka kamoreng ea hau," a rialo. "Ho ne ho tla ba betere haeba e ne e fapane ka ho felletseng. Sena se tla bonahala eka re leka ho e kopanya le ho hloleha. Ke na le bonnete ba hore nka fumana e 'ngoe inthaneteng ka' mala o betere. "
yo: Ìyá, ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n oníbàárà ní gbogbo ipò, ń darí ọ̀nà lọ sí igun ohun ọ̀ṣọ́ níbi tí ibùsùn ọmọdé kékeré jókòó sí. "Kò bá àwọn igi yòókù tó kù nínú yàrá rẹ mu," ó sọ. "Ó fẹ́rẹ̀ẹ́ dára tí ó bá yàtọ̀ pátápátá. Èyí yóò dàbí ẹni pé a gbìyànjú láti bá a mu tí a sì kùnà. Ó dá mi lójú pé mo lè rí ọ̀kan lórí ayélujára pẹ̀lú àwọ̀ tó dára.
tn: Mmamoabona, mo maemong otlhe, o isa kwa sekhutlwaneng se se gaufi le go ya kwa sekhutlwaneng se se potlana se se leng teng. "Ga o a tshwanela go nna le setlhare se se setseng mo phaposing ya gago," a rialo. 'Go ne go le botoka fa o ka bo o farologane' - It would be better if it was different Go lebega e kete re ne ra leka go e tshwara le go palelwa. "Ke kgona go bona motho yo o botoka mo Internet."

" Aita te reira e tu'ati ra i te toe'a o te raau i roto i to oe piha ", ta'na ïa parau. " E mea maitai a'e ahiri e, e mea taa ê roa. Mai te huru ra e, ua tamata matou i te tu'ati i te reira e aita i manuïa. Ua papû ia'u e, e nehenehe ta'u e ite i te hoê i ni'a i te itenati i te hoê û maitai a'e ".

en: The Mothers are still crying a bit, but it’s mostly happy whispering now. I told them that I both wanted and didn’t want them here, because it’s always a moment you think you’re going to share with the father of your baby, but I also didn’t want to face it alone.
